misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes they must save the last element, shift elements from right-to-left to avoid overwriting, then put the saved last element into index 0.
misconceptions.conceptual_gap: No gap detected. This matches Java’s array semantics (indexed access, assignment overwrites, need for temporary storage when shifting in-place).
misconceptions.error_manifestation: None. Produces correct shifted array for N>0 and behaves sensibly for N=0 (prints just 'Shifted: ').
